long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Session Cleaner is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you effortlessly manage and clear all types of browser storage with just one click. Whether you're looking to enhance your privacy or simply declutter your browsing experience, Session Cleaner has you covered.

Key Features:
Comprehensive Data Removal: Instantly clear cookies, session data, local storage, IndexedDB, shared storage, and more from the current website, ensuring no trace of your activity is left behind.

Enhanced Privacy: Protect your online privacy by removing tracking data stored by websites, allowing you to browse with peace of mind.

User-Friendly Interface: With a simple and intuitive design, cleaning your browser storage has never been easierâ€”suitable for users of all skill levels.

One-Click Convenience: Just click the Session Cleaner icon in your toolbar, and watch as all unwanted data is wiped away instantly!

Whether you're a privacy-conscious user or want to maintain a clutter-free browsing environment, Session Cleaner is your go-to tool for effective data management. Download now and take control of your browsing data with ease!
